name: The Warrior's Trials
description:
Please download in the following link: https://drive.google.com/open?id=1Jg83LhI1-UBfCFSCuLJZLq4112f5VI4C

A quick game made for the $102 Adventure Game Challenge. We had a last minute rush 2 hours before when we sort of had to change everything over and try and tie the story together! Had a lot of trouble near the very end so unfortunately the dialogue in the actual gameplay suffered. 

We did have a song for the gameplay that didn't make it in that you can listen to and download here:

https://instaud.io/private/58429f9ea44b67fb47f96ca9d72bac1e1b18837b

I hope you can appreciate the idea behind what we were trying to achieve and appreciate what we did get done, given the constraints!
